author: Maxime Briand

changelog.release_notes:
New major version of 2048 for Pebble, featuring colors !
- Added support for Pebble Time
- Added colors to the game (obviously !)

Note : the application is still retrocompatible, if you use it on a Pebble Steel or standard Pebble it will use the default black and white setup.
Removed the javascript prototype packed by accident with the previous release.
(Hopefully) fixed an issue with the game over detection, the game would be flagged as lost while the player still had possible moves.
First upload ! Version 1.0 includes persistent save for the state of the game as well as the best score.

description:
A port of the famous 2048 game on the Pebble.

Features :
- Uses all four buttons (BACK for left, SELECT for right, UP for up, DOWN for down, long press SELECT to exit the app).
- Saves the progress when you exit and resumes any save when you launch the app again.
- Keeps track of your best score.

Don't hesitate to make any suggestion or criticism !

(Note : Do not use a long press on the back button to close the app, it will simply kill the app and won't save your progress. Instead, use the long press on the select button, this way your progress is saved and resumed when you start the app again.)
